name: CrowdTorch
tag_list: mobile-apps-for-festivals, mobile-apps-for-events, mobile-apps-for-tradeshows, mobile-apps, event-apps-for-iphone, event-apps-for-ipad, event-apps-for-android, event-apps
description: Mobile App Developer for Music, Festival
overview:
CrowdTorch is the leading provider of mobile applications for consumer and social events, with a goal to translate the experience of your event into a mobile application. We build mobile apps that capture the excitement, shared community, brand and conversation around your event. Whether it’s for a music festival, sporting event, culinary event or a community get-together, we can create a mobile app that will engage your attendees and add a little more fun!

CrowdTorch recently joined Cvent—the leading provider of cloud-based event management solutions and mobile applications for event organizers around the world. Now that CrowdTorch is a Cvent product, the solution is backed by over 950 employees spanning multiple continents.

offices.address1: 1715 S. Capital of Texas Highway, Suite 100
